New Records: Karl-Anthony Towns is the best version of himself that he's been in his career
Key Match Events: The Knicks narrowly escaped a fourth-quarter scare on Friday, but defeated the Nets without breaking a sweat on Sunday, final score of 114-104
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Thibs emphasized the importance of rebounding and defense in their previous game against the Nets
Tom Crean mentioned that OG Anunoby's physical condition and work ethic are paying off
Post-Match Reflections: Josh Hart expressed pride in the team's ability to step up and make up for Jalen Brunson's lack of scoring
Karl-Anthony Towns mentioned that he's the best version of himself that he's been in his career
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks have a talented team where they're not so reliant on Jalen Brunson scoring and creating
OG Anunoby is leading in dunks for non-centers this season
The Knicks are true contenders in the East according to Tom Crean
